text: "jiwithe jaya parajaya kiyana de api windaganna oona .
ohu ethanadila aluth thanak hadanawa.
biththi hirigalwalin nirmanaya wi thibu nisa ee matha itha siyum duhuwili wani anshu ra`di thibuna.
ada ape ira basse paswaru 8.20taya.
me aya ape kolloth ekka okkoma aadi shishyayo tika samanga hitiye.
api antharjathika prajawath samanga ganudenu karanna oona.
ee thula jiwithaya thibe dayi ohu pa්rashna karayi.
budu dahama gana hansi, pokuru wahi kiyala thiyena dewal ekka math ekangayi.
hah hah ha...nangi anagatheta watina kiyana dewal ekkasu koranawa wage dan hitanma..honda honda...

bangladeshaye pawathwena thunkon krikat tharagawaliya yatathe eeye (17da) pawathi shri lankawa saha simbabwe athara tharagayen thiyunu satanakin pasu lakunu 12ka jayak wartha kirimata simbabwe samath wiya.
mama ee ayata kiwwa me welawe mata hariyata katauththara denna ba passe ganna kiyala.
rakiya sthanaye thamange dainika wada tika salasum kara daksha lesa ikmanata awasan karanna.
me sinduwa ahagena inna gaman oold mank bothalayak gahanna puluwan.
yanu thamanta ayathwa thibu deyak sora gath ayekuta siduwewayi prarthana kara gayana karana lada was kawiyaki.

dawasak onna 11 wasaredi.ticha aawa padamata.apita ithin diwya loke giya wage.godak welawata monawa kiwwath wadiya ganan ganne na.eda samahara wita gedarinma mala panala aawada danne na.tikak wela uganna,uganna innakota "asitha" kiyala ekek
mokada yuropaye shitha ruthuwe lom adum nathuwa wasaya kirima apahasu nisa hoda illumak me wenuwen thibuna.
prarthana kirimata ek karanna obe pathum layisthuwata nishpadana ekathu kara atha.
rajya sewakayekuta wethana, dimana paththaka thiyala 'rata' wenuwen wada karanna kiwwoth payakwath wada karayida?
anthimata aayathanaye manawa sanwardhana anshaye lokka mage hamineta katha karala me wisthare kiyala "dan api mokada karanne" kiyala ahala.
namuth eya ee niwus karyalayata ginii thabima anumatha karana dinamina wargaye pahath janamadhya bhawithawak dakwa gena noyannata api wagabala ganimu.
lowe sama deyak ma anithya bawa da anathma bawa da pawasima ehi yatharthayak nathayi pawasima da?

oya mata bala kale na ramani.oya magen illimak kala.
methanin helawenna epa therunada?

kamkaru panthiya samaja arbudayata thamange ma samajawadi wisanduma idiriyata damimen walakwamin ha dakshinanshika piyawarayanta sahayogaya demin ha eewa kriyathmaka karamin stalinwadin, kamkaru panthiya deshapalanika wa pakshaghatha karaddi, mahajana ichchabhangaya ha gambauru wana aarthika anarakshithathawa kerehi bhithiya gasakamata hindu dakshinanshaya samath wi thibe.
oba gaman karanne ee pare kiyala kawruhari obata chodana kaloth mokakda obata thiyena pilithura?
ee sathkamata apita udawu karanna puluwan nam aththatama eeka loku pinak.”
mama ka gasuwa nisa ee miniha mage kata thada kala."

dineshge wayama patakaya athata genayanna dayaka una kenek widiyata,sulohithayek widiyata me parisaraya asuru kala kenek widiyata obata danena hagim wachanayen wisthara kara ganna bari tharam wenna oona.
siyage maranaya gana kiyanna aapu mayikalta wada ee mohothe hitapu mayikal gana mata puduma bandimak athi wuna.
wahama eyawa kandawala wade bara dunnalu..
ee sandaha mahaththayage artha sadhakaya aran geyi ithuru wada tika karanawa.
udin pallen ema kada sappu weth giya ma ihalama malayata gos nawathunemi.
mage langa maru salli na.
sabandiyawan onna patan gannakotama kiyuwa meka madak.
ohu da gas madima thama jiwana wruththiya kara gaththeya.
"paraduwata thiyanne ape jiwitha wentathi."
mama noman daka thibune natha.
me punchi kamara kallata athulu wena dora paluwa gawin bima punchi kohu lanu papissak dala thibune ayida kiyana karanaya gana welawakata mata harima gataluwak.

me okkotama wada honda manussayek.

eyath thaththayi ayiyayi wagema, res padilla ange thiyena kenek.
monawa unath sudika uuta podikale salakapu hatinan ageyi.
naththale santha klos (shantha nikolas) puwatha kopamana janapriya da kiwahoth, ee charithaya pilibandawa dawantha chithrapatayak da thanini.

hungak welawata mama dakala oof karanawa mun kakulak wen wenna kapaganna issara.
ellum gaha genna ranil uthsaha karanawada ?
ohu swadhina wena bawa kiyanawada?

me awurudu kate thiyagena le rathwena dewal mokata kiyanawada (liyanawada) kiyala hithala kattiya set wechcha welawaka (awurudu nisa kastiya set wenawane me dawaswala) hamotama kiyala rasawindinna puluwan wargaye kathawakma kiyanna oona kiyala hithila me kathawa kiyanna (liyanna)hithuwa.
nishpadanaya metirak ton ganakin wadi wela thiyenawa.
idiri kotasakin ee gana katha karanawa.
ese kirimata ape ranawiruwo 29000 k diwi pidu athara, 14,000 k purna aabadhitha thaththwayata path wiya.

namuth ada kalaye apa siyalu denatama pahe athi diyawadiyawa danata shathawarsha bagayakata pera apa samajaye ada thibena parimanayen nothibu bawa bohodena nodanna karanayak, diyawadiyawa gana kiwwahama danata wasara 50 ta pera wiwahayak kara ganimata pera yamwidiyakin pawule kenekuta diyawadiyawa thiyanawanam ema pawulen wiwahayak nokaraganimata pawa parannan parisam wi thibenawa, parani wiwaha sirith wimawuwahama obata mebawa therum ganna puluwan.
aththatama hisarudawa athiwanne ape hisehi ha belle mansha peshiwala, rudhara wahaniwala saha snayuwalayi.
